page.title: 13NAME CHANGES
page.content: In this area there have been a number of name changes over the years.Cole Henley was originally called{ {COLDHENLEIGH}and had an enclosure for cattle to rest when travelling along the old roads. Wooldings was originally called{ {HOLDINGS.}Paul's Heath was called{ {PAUL'S WOOD.}Hogdigging was named{ {HOG'S WOOD}and Larksborough was called{LARK'S BARROW.} A number of the fields in the area have names such as: Arden Hollybush White Hare Whites Scufflers Stave Acres Hogdigging Curlew Starve Acres Gregory Dormouse Vetch Close Harts Wood Baileys Loves Meadow Leesrol Covert Side Eel Pits Angle Down Spindles New Fields Bakelands Paddocks
